summary: SSAO + DOF. This is another ENB graphic mod that improved the visuals.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]  See --> - [b][color=#FF0000]RUZ[/color][color=\"#990000\"]\'s ENB Cinematic Fusion[/b] [/size] [/color] (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17319)
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/2451336-1337027361.jpg[/img]


[size=6]   CURRENT VERSION - [color=#FF0000][b]RUZ\'s ENB FUSION 1.2 [/b][/color] [/size]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/2451336-1336424478.jpg[/img]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/2451336-1336497146.jpg[/img]


[size=3.5][b]   There are 5 versions of this mod:[/b]
VERY HIGH (high SSAO + DOF + high AF)
HIGH (high SSAO + high AF)
MEDIUM (good SSAO + good AF)
LOW (only AF)
VERY LOW (only AF; less brightless) [/size]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/2451336-1336497108.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/2451336-1336424703.jpg [/img]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/2451336-1336497301.jpg[/img]

This is simply my current Enb Configuration. I like it and so I decided to share it with you.

I take the merits  only for the edits of \'\"Enbseries.ini\" and merging multiple files and for attempts in order to find the right combination of multiple files. (for this i named it \"Fusion\")

This is another ENB graphic mod that improved the visuals.

I hope you like it.

[size=5][b]How to - [color=#FF0000]Install it [/size][/color][/b]

(optional) Create a copy of previous files.

Extract the file of \"RUZ\'s ENB FUSION\" in the directory C/Programs/Steam/Steammapps/common/Skyrim.

Copy all files.

Have fun 

[size=0.5]Explanation
Since the file \"d3d9.dll\" was deleted from Vorontsov\'s site, I put it online.[/size]
author: RUZ
